This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: i was walking home from my friends house and saw this strange object without wings not a blimp and it was red and white like a missile but traveling to slow.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was december 28, 2006 i was walking home from my friends house it was about four fourty p.m. and i saw a object in the sky and cigar shaped. it was also red and white it was weird because it didnt have any wings. but iknow it wasnt a blimp. this is my second time reporting a ufo and plus ive been seeing a lot of strange things coming fom the noth whic dayton ohio is north and which is where wright patterson airforce base is. as i said in the other report where i saw a different ufo, my great uncle lester worked at wright patterson and only told us that there was other life out there and if he said anything else he said that he would be court marshalled. it could be something human but i cant think of anything else other then a missile but it was traveling to slow to be one.at first i thought it was a plane but thats when i noticed it had no wings. it was coming from the north where wright patterson air force base os and it was moving south.i lost sight of it after chasing it on foot.
